category.name: FMS
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: TC_allow_inherited_group_volume_access
preference.preference_description: Allows a group to inherit access to a Teamcenter volume from its parent group. That is, if a group is explicitly granted volume access, and this preference is set to a nonzero number, that group's subgroups (and the subgroup's children) are implicitly granted access to that volume. Inherited access applies to all volumes including default local volumes, also known as store and forward volumes. Valid Values: 0 - Does not allow groups to inherit access to a volume from its parent group. Single positive integer - Allows groups to inherit access to a volume from its parent group.
